Description_lang: Break the seal on the book, granting you Torment of the Worgen. When striking an enemy that is below 30% health, you gain the Frenzy of the Worgen, increasing damage done by $228850s1% for 30 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
AuraDescription_lang: Melee attacks and abilities on enemies below 30% health grant Frenzy of the Worgen. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
